revised_title: Investigating the Infectivity of Glossina palpalis Fed on Sleeping Sickness Patients Under Treatment
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the infectivity of Glossina palpalis fed on sleeping sickness patients under treatment. They found that mechanical transmission of the disease from treated patients to normal monkeys was negative, and that sleeping sickness was not transmitted from any patient to monkeys by the flies in the second method of transmission.
